channel.title: About the basiux category
channel.description:
[Benevolent Artificial Super Intelligence User eXperience][1].
For now, I'll be using this category for **sending in news** (instead of [mailchimp][2]).
Just sign up and **watch** the [category][3] ([how to][4])! ;)
Also, maybe you want to make sure you unsubscribe from the forum weekly digest newsletter. It's almost unrelated to basiux. Kind of.
<small>This can also work as a better alternative forum to [the "main" one][5], while I can't figure out how to [host many discourses][6].</small>
A few more relevant links:
- [My research][7]. - The [meet up group][8].
[1]: http://basiux.org [2]: http://us11.campaign-archive1.com/home/?u=b1272260061f994a68ccffbb6&id=155d5f1d8d [3]: /c/basiux [4]: https://github.com/discourse/discourse/wiki/Basic-Usage-Guide#category-notifications [5]: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/basiux/J_KTUndRUcU [6]: https://meta.discourse.org/t/free-hosted-option/9621/62?u=cawas [7]: http://s.cregox.com/basiux-research [8]: http://www.meetup.com/basiux-lisbon/

item.title: About the basiux category
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Benevolent Artificial Super Intelligence User eXperience.

For now, I'll be using this category for sending in news (instead of mailchimp).

Just sign up and watch the category (how to)!

Also, maybe you want to make sure you unsubscribe from the forum weekly digest newsletter. It's almost unrelated to basiux. Kind of.

This can also work as a better alternative forum to the "main" one, while I can't figure out how to host many discourses.

A few more relevant links:

  • My research.
  • The meet up group.
